2. Enter old email and name
3. Click 'Sign Up'

Test Case Title: Login User with correct email and password
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Go to 'Signup / Login'
2. Enter correct email and password
3. Click 'Login'
Expected Result: User should be logged in successfully.

Test Case Title: Login User with incorrect email and password
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Go to 'Signup / Login'
2. Enter invalid email or password
3. Click 'Login'
Expected Result: Error message: 'Your email or password is incorrect!' should appear.

Preconditions: Browser launched, user has internet access and previously logged in
Test Steps: Press logout button
Expected Result: User should be logged out

Test Case Title: Verify All Products and product detail page
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Go to products page
2. Check that all products are available
3. Click on view products and verify that there are the same data
Expected Result: Products page opens and product details product match the product page

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:

2. Check that all products are available
3. Click on search box and type any product
Expected Result: The user's search matches the result

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.

2. Enter valid email and press the arrow button
Expected Result: Subscription completed successfully.

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:

2. Enter valid email and press the arrow button

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Browse to Products.
2. Hover over a product and click Add to Cart.
3. Click Continue Shopping.
4. Add another product.
5. Click View Cart.
6. Verify both products are displayed with correct details.
Expected Result: Both products are listed with correct prices and quantities.

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Open a product detail page.
2. Set quantity to 4.
3. Click Add to Cart.
4. Open the cart page and verify the displayed quantity.
Expected Result: Product displayed in cart with quantity of 4

Preconditions: Browser launched, user has internet access and not logged in.
Test Steps:
1. Add a product to the cart.
2. Proceed to checkout.
3. Click Register / Login.
4. Complete registration.
5. Continue checkout, verify address, and enter payment details.
6. Confirm the order.
Expected Result: Order is successfully placed and confirmation message displayed.

Preconditions: Browser launched, user has internet access and user registered.
Test Steps:
1. Log in.
2. Add product(s) to the cart.
3. Proceed to checkout.
4. Confirm shipping details and payment.
5. Submit the order.
Expected Result: Order is successfully placed and confirmation message displayed.

Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Log in.
2. Add product(s) to the cart.
3. Proceed to checkout.
4. Confirm shipping details and payment.
5. Submit the order.
Expected Result: Order is successfully placed and confirmation message displayed.

Preconditions: Cart must contain at least one product

2. Click the Remove (X) icon beside the item.
3. Verify that the product is removed.

Test Case Title: Add to Cart from Recommended items
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:

2. Add a product to the cart.

Test Case Title: Verify that user cannot procceed to checkout while cart is empty
Preconditions: User logged in and cart is empty
Test Steps: Click on cart while empty and look for proceed to ckeckout
Expected Result: There is no proceed to checkout/ error message appears

Test Case Title: Verify Address Details in Checkout Page
Preconditions: User must be logged in with saved address details.
Test Steps:
1. Log in.
2. Add a product to the cart.
3. Proceed to checkout.
4. Verify displayed billing and delivery addresses.
Expected Result: Addresses match those in the user profile.

Preconditions: Completed order required.
Test Steps:
1. Complete an order successfully.
2. Click Download Invoice on the confirmation page.
3. Open the downloaded file.
Expected Result: Invoice file downloads and displays correct order information.

Test Case Title: Verify Scroll Up using 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Scroll down the homepage.
2. Click the Arrow Up button.
3. Observe scroll behavior.
Expected Result: Page smoothly scrolls to the top of the screen.

Test Case Title: Verify Scroll Up without 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality
Preconditions: Browser launched and user has internet access.
Test Steps:
1. Scroll down manually using the mouse.
2. Scroll back up to the top.
3. Verify the page scrolls smoothly.
Expected Result: Page returns to the top; header is visible again.
